title: Can we please have Custom Announcers?
body:
Hey all,

Pretty much summed up in the title, I think it'd be really cool to have a videogamedunkey announcer or something of the likes. I'm not suggesting that you guys make them, but I just really would want to be able to easily install them and leave it to the community to create them.
Pls Rito...

Thanks all.
~ Mr Zeroxs.
